Different Crime.Crime Name: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act Violation
procedural_fairness: decision was fair and procedurally sound
evidence_assessment: lack of linkage between evidence and Applicants' case
judicial_review_process: evaluates procedural fairness, bias, and linkage between evidence and personal situation

reasonableness_of_decision: dismissed claims of reliance on extrinsic evidence and failure to assess minors' risk due to absence of such arguments in submissions
